name: Urban Morbus - Anniversary Vacation
description:
Urban Morbus - Anniversary vacation  acts as introduction to the Urban Morbus games and reveals small part of the story.  Short horror-ish game that can be completed in 15 to 30 minutes.

Game will receive updates in following week(s), first update will focus on proper lights for the map (instead pitch black). If you are curious enough to play, suggestions and feedback is much appreciated !

Game too dark ? After level load, open settings and play around with "Gamma"

Found bugs or other odd things? Let me know by sending comment or by email runbycoffee@gmail.com
